Throws: if the builder doesn't have enough state to create a valid request
build().Description: Finishes building and returns the session. Returned session will always have non-empty non-null identifier.

setDescription(java.lang.String).Description: Sets a description for this session.

Parameters: a start time, in milliseconds since epoch, inclusive
setStartTimeMillis(long).Description: Sets the start time of the session.

setActiveTime(long, java.util.concurrent.Description: Sets the active session period duration.
setActiveTime(long, java.util.concurrent.FullName: public Session.Builder setActiveTime (long time, TimeUnit timeUnit)

setActivity(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the activity associated with this session. The specified activity value should be one of the values in @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#FitnessActivities_E@. If an unrecognized value is specified, or if not specified, the activity for the session is set to @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#FitnessActivities#UNKNOWN_E@.

Parameters: a start time, in the given unit since epoch, inclusive
setStartTime(long, java.util.concurrent..Description: Sets the start time of the session.
setStartTime(long, java.util.concurrent..FullName: public Session.Builder setStartTime (long time, TimeUnit timeUnit)

Parameters: an end time, in the given unit since epoch, inclusive
setEndTime(long, java.util.concurrent.Ti.Description: Sets the end time of the session. If end time is not specified, session is considered to be still ongoing.
setEndTime(long, java.util.concurrent.Ti.FullName: public Session.Builder setEndTime (long time, TimeUnit timeUnit)

setName(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the a human readable name of the session.

setActivity(int).Description: Sets the activity associated with this session. The specified activity value should be one of the recognized @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#FitnessActivities_E@. If an unrecognized value is specified, or if not specified, the activity for the session is set to @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#FitnessActivities#UNKNOWN_E@.

Parameters: an end time, in milliseconds since epoch, inclusive
setEndTimeMillis(long).Description: Sets the end time of the session. If end time is not specified, session is considered to be still ongoing.

setIdentifier(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the identifier for this session. Must be unique for the client application.

ClassDesc: Builder used to create new Sessions.
